casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Joseph Burton MIAL No. 17P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Jospeh Burton Mial, for Mial, Joseph Burton. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 15th of May 2018 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Guilford County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of May 2018 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
